string.value: #b#p12100##k stands at #b#m50000##k. They say she is the strongest person on Maple Island.... Why is she here? What's her life story? Go talk to #p12100#.

#p12100# was a new adventurer and worker on Victoria Island. But the elder, #p12000# in #m1010000# hired her to protect against dangerous situations on Maple Island. #p12100# says it's a hard because of all the work... Tell #b#p12000##k what #p12100# said.

#p12000# agreed with what #p12100# said. He said it's better to hire more workers. Then he asked you to tell #b#p1002101##k in #b#m104000000##k... #m104000000# is on Victoria Island... You have to go to #b#p22000##k in #b#m60000##k.

Maple Island is a land for beginning adventurers. Monsters are relatively weak here, but you need some experience to become a skilled adventurer. When you are a beginner, you have to try your best to train hard. \r\n#b#L0# You look very strong. Why are you on Maple Island?#l

Because I'm a trainer. Mr.#p12000# hired me. I quit adventuring in Victoria Island to protect the people in this town instead. Besides that, beginners always need a bit of guidance. But I've got far too much work these days...If you have a chance to go to #m1010000#, can you give a message to Mr. #p12000#?

Ah, thank you. There are a lot of travelers in Maple Island and even more monsters. It's hard for me to protect people by myself. So please tell #b#p12000##k of #b#m1010000##k to hire one more person. Thank you.
Hmm... Aren't you planning to go to #m1010000#? You can go to #m60000# directly.

Hmm... Who are you? Did #p12100# send you here? Why? 
#b#L0# #p12100# asked you for a raise. #l
#L1#Because there are many beginners in Maple Island, it's hard for #p12100# to work by herself. #l
#L2# #p12100# said she wanted to compete with #p12000#. #l

Hmm... Did #p12100# say that? Would you tell #b#p1002101##k in #b#m104000000##k what she said? You won't be here much longer so you can deliver the message when you get to #bVictoria Island#k. Thank you.
Thank you. Ah, don't worry about the fare. You have to go to #b#m60000##k to go to Victoria Island. #m60000# knows who #b#p22000##k is. I'll tell him to take you for free.
Mai asked for a raise? I don't believe it. Are you lying?
Compete...? Did Mai say that? I know there's no strong men in Maple Island, but it's nonsense to ask this old man like me to compete.
Haven't you met #b#p12000##k yet? I'll take a walk in front of the store of #b#m1010000##k. Go ahead.
